name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab page with Gush Etzion photo

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unique photos of Gush Etzion by Yair Aronshtam

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Opens a new tab with a beautiful Gush Etzion photo (new random photo every time, more than 1500 photos).
In addition the frequently visited sites links are on the left (In case you don't want the frequently visited sites to be displayed, you can hide them from extension "Options").
All photos are by Yair Aronshtam.
